title: I am studying for a B.Tech (mechanical) in IIT Delhi. I am very much interested in coding stuff. Where should I start and continue? - Quora
tags: Entry Level Career Advice in Computer Science

response.answer_text: If you already have programming knowledge then you must start on codechef or SOJP. But if want to start from scratch then grab the book named Dennis Ritchie and start studying and practicing C.
